name: Glitter Reindeer Antler Headband
description:
Product Info:

Gold glitter reindeer antlers with chocolate glitter ears. Hand cut, stiff glitter encrusted cotton drill reindeer antlers are wired for extra rigidity - securely attached to a silvertone aliceband.

name: Glitter Christmas Pud Fascinator
description:
Product Info:

As kitsch as Christmas! Our Glitter Christmas Pud Fascinator consists of hand cut glitter christmas pudding, topped with miniature holly, attached to a silvertone aliceband, elastic headband, crocodile clip or clear comb.

name: Glitter Holly Headband
description:
Product Info:

Christmas Kitsch! Our Glitter Holly Headband consist of handcut glitter holly leaves and berries, backed with comfortable felt. Choose from silvertone aliceband, elastic headband, crocodile clip or clear comb attachment.

name: Glitter Poinsettia Headband
description:
Product Info:

Feeling festive? Our glitter poinsetta headband consists of an oversized hand cut glitter poinsettia bloom with glitter foliage and backed with comfortable felt. Choose from a silvertone aliceband, elastic headband, crocodile clip or comb attachment.

name: Glitter Holly Hair Clip
description:
Product Info:

Hand cut, no shed, glitter encrusted cotton drill holly and berries backed with comfortable felt and attached to a silvertone crocodile clip. Wear in a topknot, as a festive bow tie or at the end of a beautiful fishtail plait.

description:
Product Info:

All the best presents are topped with a bow… double glitter bow in green on red in a crocodile clip or brooch attachment; wear in your hair, on your collar or on your bag!

description:
Product Info:

Product Info:

name: Christmas Wreath Headband
description:
Product Info:

Two large velvet red poinsettia blooms, fire tree detailing and even a little plastic pine cone create the ultimate Christmas wreath headband. Securely attached to a silvertone aliceband.

name: Mistletoe Headband
description:
Product Info:

Will you get your Christmas kiss? This super sweet and kitsch mistletoe headband will sure help! Be a bit cheeky this holidays with a cluster of silk mistletoe, securely attached to a silvertone aliceband and finished with a red ribbon bow.

name: Holly and Berry Headband
description:
Product Info:

A halo of satin holly leaves and finished with metallic bead berries and sit atop a silvertone aliceband.

name: Frosted Mistletoe Garland Crown
description:
Product Info:

Braided rustic wire crown garland base with wintery frosted mistletoe detailing, finished with double satin ribbon close. this crown can be carefully moulded to suit the shape of your head.

name: Poinsettia Halo Headband - Red or White
description:
Product Info:

The ultimate holiday headband! Velvet poinsettia blooms are complimented with gold detailing and backed with green satin foliage. Securely attached to a silvertone aliceband Available in red or white.

name: Christmas Wreath Garland Crown - Red or White
description:
Product Info:

The ultimate Christmas crown! Clusters of poinsetta, gold foliage, mistletoe and holly leaves and berries form this statement Christmas wreath garland headband. The sturdy but flexible rustic wire base can be shaped to suit the shape of your head. Finished with double satin ribbon ties. Choose from White or Red design.

She loves nothing more than a slick of bright pink lipstick, a spritz of her favourite scent and exploring the city she loves so much." Gala is a super sparkly glitter bow on cotton drill backing. Comprising of the highest quality, no-shed glitter, Gala is available in three ombre designs; Pretty Pink, Something Blue and Classic Black, and is available on a mirrored, silvertone aliceband.
